mapper.select: SELECT #{Member_ID} Member_ID, DATE_FORMAT(ii.SDRecv_MaxTime,'%m') Month, ifnull(SUM(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ii.SDRecv_Principal),#{skey})) AS SIGNED)),0)+ifnull(sum(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ii.SDRecv_Interest),#{skey})) AS SIGNED)),0) SDRecv_Amount FROM Invest_Income ii WHERE ii.Member_ID = #{Member_ID} AND ii.IsValid = 0 AND ii.SDRecv_MaxTime BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{Month_Min},'01') ,'%Y%m%d %H%i%s') AND DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{Month_Max},'01') ,'%Y%m%d %H%i%s'),INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(ii.SDRecv_MaxTime,'%Y%m') ORDER BY Month

SELECT #{Member_ID} Member_ID, DATE_FORMAT(ii.SDRecv_MaxTime,'%e') Day, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ii.SDRecv_Principal),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) SDRecv_Principal, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(ii.SDRecv_Interest),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) SDRecv_Interest FROM Invest_Income ii WHERE ii.Member_ID = #{Member_ID} AND ii.IsValid = 0 AND ii.SDRecv_MaxTime BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{Month},'01') ,'%Y%m%d %H%i%s') AND DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{Month},'01') ,'%Y%m%d %H%i%s'),INTERVAL 1 MONTH) ORDER BY Day

SELECT #{Member_ID} Member_ID, DATE_FORMAT(lr.Repay_MaxTime,'%Y%m') Month, SUM(CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(lr.SDRepay_Principal),#{skey})) AS SIGNED)+CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(lr.SDRepay_Interest),#{skey})) AS SIGNED)) SDRepay_Amount FROM Loan_Repay lr JOIN Project_App_Record pa ON lr.Apply_Id = pa.Apply_Id WHERE pa.Member_ID = #{Member_ID} AND lr.IsValid = 0 AND lr.Repay_MaxTime BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{Month_Min},'01') ,'%Y%m%d %H%i%s') AND DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{Month_Max},'01') ,'%Y%m%d %H%i%s'),INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(lr.Repay_MaxTime,'%Y%m') ORDER BY Month

SELECT #{Member_ID} Member_ID, DATE_FORMAT(lr.Repay_MaxTime,'%e') Day, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(lr.SDRepay_Principal),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) SDRepay_Principal, CAST((AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(lr.SDRepay_Interest),#{skey})) AS SIGNED) SDRepay_Interest FROM Loan_Repay lr JOIN Project_App_Record pa ON lr.Apply_Id = pa.Apply_Id WHERE pa.Member_ID = #{Member_ID} AND lr.IsValid = 0 AND lr.Repay_MaxTime BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{Month},'01') ,'%Y%m%d %H%i%s') AND DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(CONCAT(#{Month},'01') ,'%Y%m%d %H%i%s'),INTERVAL 1 MONTH) ORDER BY Day
SELECT mtr.Member_ID, mtr.Record_Date, mtr.Abstract FROM Member_Trading_Records mtr WHERE mtr.Member_ID = #{memberID} AND mtr.Statu = 1 ORDER BY mtr.Record_Date DESC
